div.p: This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/cql-access-modifier defines the following codes:

tr.td: The component is public, meaning it can be referenced from any CQL Library that references the library in which the component is defined.
The component is private, meaning it can only be referenced within the library in which the declaration is defined.

description.value: Access modifiers defined by the Clinical Quality Language (CQL) specification in the [Access Modifiers](https://cql.hl7.org/03-developersguide.html#access-modifiers) topic.

copyright.value: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license

definition.value: The component is public, meaning it can be referenced from any CQL Library that references the library in which the component is defined.
The component is private, meaning it can only be referenced within the library in which the declaration is defined.
